mapper.sql: GUID, ORGAN_CODE, ORDER_NO, ORDER_OWNER, OWNER_PHONE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, EXTRA_AMOUNT, SERVICE_FEE, PAY_AMOUNT, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, IS_VIP, CARD_NO, IS_PAY, IS_COMPLETE, IS_VISIT, IS_CANCEL, STATUS, IS_REFUND, IS_EVALUATE, USER_GUID, SOURCE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, VISIT_TIME, VISIT_RECORD, VISIT_RESULT, VISITOR
mapper.insert: insert into cs_order (GUID, ORGAN_CODE, ORDER_NO, ORDER_OWNER, OWNER_PHONE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, EXTRA_AMOUNT, SERVICE_FEE, PAY_AMOUNT, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, IS_VIP, CARD_NO, IS_PAY, IS_COMPLETE, IS_VISIT, IS_CANCEL, STATUS, IS_REFUND, IS_EVALUATE, USER_GUID, SOURCE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, VISIT_TIME, VISIT_RECORD, VISIT_RESULT, VISITOR ) values (#{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extraAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isVip,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isComplete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isVisit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isCancel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isRefund,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isEvaluate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitResult,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{visitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
